pageProps.title: amrlib
pageProps.teaser: A python library that makes AMR parsing, generation and visualization simple.

data.slogan: A python library that makes AMR parsing, generation and visualization simple.
data.description: amrlib is a python module and spaCy add-in for Abstract Meaning Representation (AMR).  The system can parse sentences to AMR graphs or generate text from existing graphs.  It includes a GUI for visualization and experimentation.
code_example: doc = nlp('This is a test of the spaCy extension. The test has multiple sentences.')
data.author: Brad Jascob
